name: Oddball Racers
description:
Race, crash, win, lose around the iconic Sterlingstone circuit.

CONTROLS

  • Steering [Left Stick, A/D, Left/Right Cursor]
  • Accelerate [Right Trigger, W, Up Cursor]
  • Brake [Left Trigger, S, Down Cursor]
  • Toggle Forward/Reverse [Button A, Left Shift, Right Shift]
  • Change view [Button Y, Left Ctrl/Cmd, Right Ctrl/Cmd]
  • Join Race [Start, Left Shift, Right Shift]
  • Continue/Accept [Button A, Space]

The graphics quality can be change whilst the game is running using keys 1-6 on the keyboard. A gamepad is recommended for the best play experience.
